resources.string:
uSticker lets you use images from your external storage as stickers in Gboard. Just copy your images to /sdcard/Pictures/Stickers/, then press the refresh button below and they will show up in the Gboard sticker list.


Have too many stickers to scroll through? Create sub-folders inside the stickers folder, and we'll generate a new sticker tab for each in Gboard.


Made by Andrew Sun
